studentLocatorSearchResults.studentLocatorSearchResult:
Ambiguous 0.955543239023
- this is reliant on having a machine-readable registry of NCES locations
- when I request this URL, the provider will then redirect my request to the appropriate provider for that NCES ID - e.g., "NCES ID 1234567 is in Georgia. I have an agreement with Georgia. Georgia's xSre provider host is sifbroker.k12.ga.us." - Provider then makes request to sifbroker.k12.ga.us, retrieves results, and sends back to original consumer.
Broker config: - the next highest provider is registered to PROVIDE xSre in the TRANSFER context.
Conversation: 1. Me to Local Broker: Hey broker, do you have student 1234? (GET /...) 2. Local Broker to Me: Let me look. 3. Local Broker to National Broker: Who has student 1234? 4. National Broker: Georgia Broker has student 1234. 5. Local Broker to Georgia Broker: Please give me student 1234. 6. Georgia Broker to Local Broker: OK, here is student 1234. 7. Local Broker to Me: OK, here is student 1234.
